title: BrentLab/callvariants pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

sample.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces. Note that if there are repeated samplenames, the fastq will be concatenated (typically this is used for libraries split across lanes)

group.errorMessage: Group name must be provided and cannot contain spaces. This may be numeric. This determines the sets of samples that will be combined for joint variant calling

genome_name.errorMessage: The genome name must correspond to one of the genome_name keys in the additional_fasta. For the reference genome, leave the 'fasta' field blank and provide a default value, eg 'reference'

fastq_1.errorMessage: FastQ file for reads 1 must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'

fastq_2.errorMessage: FastQ file for reads 2 cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'
